# Resistance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Bard Spells|Bard 0]], [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a miniature cloak)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 334

You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

*Resistance* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
